评论详情: Absolutely gorgeous watch, but I’m so mechanically inept, I had to take it to a jeweler for him to show me how to remove the links and how to fasten and unfasten it!
Too too gorgeous and adjustable as well! It comes with the tools to tighten this as needed and that’s exactly what we did! This watch is comfortable, very functional and easy to use.
I bought this Watch for my Wife and she loves it.
It's pretty and it works as expected. It doesn't feel particularly premium, but it looks how it is pictured.

I am absolutely in love with this square watch! The gold stainless steel bracelet is so elegant and has a luxurious feel, and the small face is the perfect size – not too bulky but still very stylish. It’s the perfect accessory to dress up any outfit, whether casual or more formal. The quality is exceptional, and it’s very comfortable to wear throughout the day. I’ve received so many compliments on it already! I highly recommend this watch to anyone looking for a chic and timeless piece.
Definitely worth it

Love this watch. It was slightly tough to adjust the size because the watch wasn’t a perfect fit to the adjustment tool but I was able to figure it out. The watch doesn’t look cheap and it has held up very well! It doesn’t seem to scratch easily and is very comfortable to wear. It elevates the look of all my outfits and I will definitely be wearing it regularly.

评论概述: Elegant and accurate watch, not easy to make band smaller
评论详情: This is a very pretty watch. Classic and elegant. Keeps excellent time, Calendar stays correct once set. I adore the gold with the blue face. I have a small wrist and was afraid the face would be too large and awkward for my wrist, but it's great. The packaging is nice, and giftable. However, the plastic safety wrap did take a while to remove. It did keep everything scratch free though.  The band is way too large for me, but all watches are like that and I have to adjust them. I probably need three or four links removed. What was the only problem is that I used the tool that came with it, and it bent after I removed a link and I couldn't get it to work again. I haven't taken the watch to a jeweler yet because of my schedule, but I plan to soon because I really want to wear this watch. So that's the reason for a star off. I would buy this brand again, and just take straight to the jeweler next time.

It is a gift that I plan to give this Christmas and I think it is good, it is elegant, simple, small, discreet, it looks fine and of good quality, it is light which makes it quite convenient and comfortable, I plan to update this review after the person who is going to receive it gives his opinion about it.

This watch looks much more expensive than it is and I love that it also shows the date. It comes with a tool to adjust the size, but I will say that this watch was a bit more difficult for me to adjust than some others I have. I was still able to do it, but be patient with the process.

This is such a good looking little watch. It’s slim and lightweight and super comfortable to wear. The build quality is actually really nice.  It’s easy to read and feels very durable as well. All functionality works as expected. Highly recommended.

Looks like a VERY expensive famous maker watch with its tank shaped face. The gold is very rich looking as is the deployant buckle. Had to have the bracelet shortened a bit by the local jeweler, one link out and it's perfect. It's so comfortable I haven't even taken it off! Really classic style, love it! Would be a really great gift!

This is an absolutely gorgeous watch.  Quality made and it has a solid feel to it.  I love watches and have purchase a lot, but this is the first time that the watch came with a tool to remove links.  What a novel idea.  The one thing I did not like was the protective plastic that encased the entire watch (I believe you can see this in photo #2).  It took me nearly a half hour to remove it all.  Other than that I am totally satisfied with this watch.
Very good looks, quality, has a date 📅 Shiny.
Beautiful watch. Quality is amazing. Looks so good !

No lie, I think this dope for a $40 watch. It's a nice size for ladies. Pretty dainty for my small wrist. This 3 links I took off were not exactly a breeze but also weren't super hard to deal with. The little tool is helpful though this specific model doesn't sit just right. I had to slide a card or two underneath to line it up just right to push the pins. Tweezers help screw the needle into the tool. I think this is as awesome as my fossil and Nixon watch for just $40.  I love that this has a date thing too! Never had a watch with that and it's helpful for me. First position on dial is for date, and second position is to move clock hands. Shipping was fast and it was packaged really nicely in foam, nice box, wrapped in plastic to protect face, back, and even straps. I'd recommend!

评论概述: Great Watch, Especially for the Price
评论详情: Beautiful and fantastic quality watch, especially considering how inexpensive it is.  It comes well packaged and wrapped in thin plastic to prevent Scratches during transport.

The OLEVS Square Watch is a stunning addition to any wardrobe. Its gold stainless steel bracelet and delicate small face create a perfect blend of modern and classic elegance. Lightweight and comfortable, it's ideal for everyday wear or special occasions. A great choice for a chic, understated accessory!
Comes beautifully packaged. Comes with battery and already working clock. Beautiful watch face, and gold band. Easily sizeable. Very beautiful addition to my collection!

I love the modern look of this watch. It looks way more expensive than it is with the “diamond” accents. I needed a gold watch for when I wear gold jewelry and this fits the bill without breaking the bank. I usually get a skin reaction from nickel in jewelry but have not had any reaction from this watch. Good purchase!

is a brand that I have purchased two watches from and they knock it out of park in terms of style, quality and affordability. I haven't been disappointed yet. This watch is beautifully made, it runs well, and the attention to detail is outstanding.  While not Rolex, they emulate the quality and style very well and  imitation is the sincerest form of flattery . 10/10

As someone who appreciates the charm of traditional timepieces, I find this watch to be a delightful blend of classic elegance and modern style. While many contemporary watches boast sleek digital features, this one stands out with its gorgeous blue face and luxurious gold finish. The bracelet is not only stylish but also comfortable to wear throughout the day. Despite the convenience of smartwatches, I would choose this beautiful "gadget" over my iPhone watch any day.  I highly recommend this product.

评论概述: Just as described: elegant and basic at the same time
评论详情: What attracted me to this watch was the blue face and golden strap, which goes well with a bright blue suit I have (with golden buttons). But that aside, this watch can become a staple in your wardrobe because you wear it with fancy or more casual clothing. The watch arrived well-packed, in a padded box, and then wrapped VERY well - it took me a little while to undo all the packaging but the reward is a, unscratched product. I appreciate that a tool and good instructions were included to shorten the armband to my size. That was done quickly. I'm grateful I didn't have to bring it to a jeweler for that. I expected the watch to feel a little heavier (which maybe subconsciously I equate with quality although that is questionable). On the plus side, it may be nice to not even feel the watch. In the description it says "The feel of the chain against your skin is smooth and comfortable—you’ll basically forget it’s there." I think that is true. So, yes, I recommend this watch.
Very happy with this beautiful, elegant looking watch.  I like the rhinestones on the sides and hash mark accents. The gold is a great color and shiny. I will be wearing this a lot. Good price point.

This is a proper ladies' watch with a small face, but looks highly elegant between the design and construction/finish.  The gems along the side shine very nicely.  The hands are even glow-in-the-dark, which is an added plus.  Now the one big detriment to analog watches is that the batteries don't last and they are stupid-expensive to replace, so it would be nice if they start making these USB-C rechargeable, or at least charge magnetically similar to smart watches.  Opens up all sorts of possibilities.

Pictures and video do not do this justice. The jewels on the side and inside on the face brilliantly capture the light as does the mirror dial. The calendar window is a nice additional movement, and the gold seems richer than my 18 karat watch. It's elegant, it's dainty, and my wife absolutely loves it! Keeps good time, and it turns the eye. You couldn't ask for more in a watch, and it's all at a fair price! I should probably also point out that it arrived almost immediately, within a day. It would be hard to recommend this watch more!
